questionOne.question: A child appears to be lost in the street, do you:

options.option: To be filled --------
Stay with them until they are collected
Blog on social media to find a search party
Re-assure they will find their parents
Call local services

questionTwo.question: You see a retired man attending to his garden, you are likely to:

options.option: Check back later to see it's progress
Gift them with a plant from the local shop
Ask if they would like help
Compliment on their work
Advise some nice flower shops and idea's

questionThree.question: A car has broken down on your street, would you:

options.option: Watch as they fix the car
Offer to use your drive to get them off the road
Check if they need help
Avoid making a fuss of them, they will fix it
Guide them to move the car to a safer place

questionFour.question: Your friend needs to borrow some money, the best action is to:

options.option: Give them a list of chores, offering money on completion
Offer them the money
Talk them through their expenses
Talk about the situation and how to go forward
Suggest contact for help and actions

questionFive.question: Living next door to a charity shop, you:

options.option: Offer help in the evening
Look to donate items on a regular basis
Promote the shop to your contacts
Aim to buy from there frequently
Make suggestions to improve the shop
